projects.title: Chess.com livestats
projects.content: Simple service with users live stats for OBS usage written with HTML, Bootstrap and jQuery.

projects.title: Wagapp
projects.content: Web app for storing car weight measurements. Hosted on GCP. Written with Golang and React.js with Auth0 authentication.

projects.title: Bitlyke
projects.content: Bit.ly like URL shortener hosted on Heroku. Written in Golang.

projects.title: SlackUp
projects.content: Slack report generator for your own developer convenience.

projects.title: Discord bot
projects.content: Python bot for spamming random google search images when using keywords. Hosted on heroku.

projects.title: SmallPAF
projects.content: Service for asynchronous JIRA estimations. Uses integrations with JIRA and simple email-based authentication. Deployed at https://smallpaf.fly.dev/.

projects.title: JH
projects.content: JQ like CLI tool for HTML except JSON. Crafted for personal usage.
